Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town's Crossroads: Personal Conflicts and Impending Change
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the central characters and setting of Ghost Town, establishing personal conflicts and hinting at broader changes coming to the town with the arrival of surveyors and airport plans.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Argument and Cowboy's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the initial conflict between the woman in the green hat (Nan) and the Cowboy in the saloon, followed by his frustrated departure from Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town and Initial Conflict

sub_scenes.title: Arrival of Surveyors and Airport Announcement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the surveyors and their jeep, revealing the plan to build an airport in Ghost Town, causing shock and opposition.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Surveyors and the Airport Plan
Cowboy's Shock and the Impending Destruction of Ghost Town

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Tensions and Rising Community Discontent
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the romantic misunderstandings between Nan and Cal, Nan's internal reflections, and the growing discontent among the Ghost Town residents due to the impending 'progress'.

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Misunderstanding and Nan's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan and Cal's continued argument about romantic notions, leading to Nan's departure and her subsequent reflections on love.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Romantic Misunderstanding and Parting
Nan's Reflection on Love and Past Hurt

sub_scenes.title: Encounter with Rough Men and Resentment of Progress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a group of rough men expressing their resentment towards the changes and 'progress' being brought to Ghost Town, creating a sense of threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Rough Men and Discontent with 'Progress'

Major_Arcs.title: Humiliation and Consolation: Nan's Emotional Turmoil
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays Nan's series of humiliations and her emotional responses, from being dismissed by businessmen to being scolded by her father, followed by consolation from her mother and maid.

sub_scenes.title: Businessmen's Dismissal and Father's Scolding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's attempt to help businessmen, her dismissal, and subsequent scolding and humiliation by her father.

narrative_arcs.title: Businessmen Discuss Airport and Horses, Nan Interjects

sub_scenes.title: Mother and Maid's Comfort and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan being comforted by her mother and maid regarding Cal, leading to Nan's resolve to confront Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother and Maid Console Nan About Cal

Major_Arcs.title: Conflicting Desires and Cal's Confession
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays Nan and Cal's continued conflict and separation, followed by Cal's unexpected return and confession of his true feelings, amidst the backdrop of horse business.

sub_scenes.title: Horse Business and Disagreement with Cal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes the business discussion about horses and transitions into Nan's confrontation with Cal, leading to disagreement and his departure.

sub_scenes.title: Loneliness and Unexpected Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's loneliness in Cal's absence, followed by his surprising return and heartfelt confession.

Major_Arcs.title: Winter's Fury and Community Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the focus to a severe winter storm hitting Ghost Town, the community's worry for livestock, and Cal's resolve to act amidst the escalating crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Conversation and Winter's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contains the continuation of Nan and Cal's emotional conversation, followed by the narrator's reflection and the arrival of severe winter weather.

sub_scenes.title: Community Worry and Cal's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the community's growing worry about livestock in the snowstorm, a moment of indoor comfort, and Cal's decisive resolve to address the crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Despair and Hope in the Snowstorm
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the community's despair and faint hope amidst the relentless snowfall, culminating in the arrival of a plane with fodder, bringing relief.

narrative_arcs.title: Hope from the Sky: Arrival of the Plane and Fodder

sub_scenes.title: Romance and Reality in the Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the winter storm sequence with Nan and Cal reflecting on romance and reality in the aftermath of the crisis.

Major_Arcs.title: Cowtown Casanova: Introduction of Chane Benson and Town Reactions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson in Cowtown, showcasing his dramatic entrance and the diverse reactions of the townspeople to his forceful personality.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Gossip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chane Benson's dramatic arrival and fight in Cowtown, followed by varied reactions and gossip among the townspeople.

Major_Arcs.title: Jeff's Troubled Hero Worship and Dangerous Path
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores Jeff's unhealthy hero worship of his father and his increasingly concerning behavior, influenced by figures like Clyde Surrett, leading to confrontation and worry.

sub_scenes.title: Reminiscence and Unhealthy Hero Worship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a woman reminiscing about Jeff's childhood hero worship of his father and her current concerns about its unhealthy nature.

narrative_arcs.title: Reminiscing About Jeff's Childhood Hero Worship

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Plea for Decency
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the woman confronting Jeff about his father's gun and pleading with him to become a decent citizen, followed by Jeff justifying himself by comparing to Clyde Surrett and embracing violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Justifying Actions with Clyde Surrett's Example
Dismissing Chane Benson and Embracing Violence

Major_Arcs.title: Seeking Help and Foreshadowing Trouble
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the woman's increasing hopelessness about Jeff and her plea to Clyde for help, balanced with moments of romantic reassurance, but foreshadowing further trouble.

sub_scenes.title: Hopelessness and Plea to Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene captures the woman's internal hopelessness about correcting Jeff's path and her subsequent plea to Clyde for help.

narrative_arcs.title: Expressing Fear and Seeking Help from Clyde
Declaration of Love and Duty Towards Jeff
Reassurance and Promise of Shared Happiness

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Introduction of Mr. Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the narrator's sense of foreboding, Jeff's disappearance, and the introduction of Mr. Benson offering 'tips' to Sally.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Pursuit to Town
Introduction of Mr. Benson and Seeking Advice
Chane Benson's Menacing Demeanor and Disdain for Young Boys

Major_Arcs.title: Newspaper Conflict and Benson's Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the conflict arising from an article published in the Clarion about Chane Benson, Benson's threats, and the editor's resolve to stand against him.

sub_scenes.title: Article's Repercussions and Warning about Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Sally and Clyde discussing the repercussions of the article about Benson and Sally warning Clyde about Benson's cunning nature.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation about the Article and Benson's Threat
Warning about Benson's Cunning and Cowardice

sub_scenes.title: Editor's Resolve and Strategic Considerations
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Sally seeking action from the editor and the editor's decision to stay and fight against Benson, followed by the editor's reflections on dealing with Benson strategically.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Action from the Editor and Decision to Stay
Clyde's Unwavering Resolve and Benson's Character

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Deception and Benson's Manipulation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Sally and Jeff's shifting opinions on Benson, leading to a dinner invitation, and the manipulative dynamics unfolding during the dinner.

sub_scenes.title: Shifting Opinions and Dinner Invitation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Sally showing Jeff an article, leading to Jeff's changing opinion of Benson and the idea of inviting him to dinner.

narrative_arcs.title: Shifting Opinions and Dinner Invitation Idea

sub_scenes.title: Dinner with Benson and Suspicious Demonstrations
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the events of the dinner with Benson, including Jeff's delight, Sally's observations, and a prevented 'demonstration' by Chane.

sub_scenes.title: Moonlight Charm and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the morning after the dinner and shifts to a moonlight scene where Chane charms Sally, followed by a confrontation and forced affection.

Major_Arcs.title: Showdown and Rescue: Jeff's Fight and Clyde's Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc escalates the conflict to a physical showdown, Jeff fighting Chane, Sally's warning, and Jeff racing to rescue Clyde, culminating in Clyde's capture.

sub_scenes.title: Departure, Insults, and Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with Jeff walking away, followed by insults from Chane and Jeff's subsequent punch, escalating into a fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight, Warning, and Race to Rescue Clyde

sub_scenes.title: Showdown and Clyde's Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jeff arriving to find Clyde confronted by Chane and his men, leading to Clyde's capture.

Major_Arcs.title: Newspaper's Stand and Clarion Office Activities
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the Clarion office, depicting flashbacks, newspaper production, and the themes of courage and decency in journalism amidst the ongoing conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Censorship in Clarion Office
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contains a flashback to tension in the Clarion office and Sally's nervous request to Jeff to censor a headline.

sub_scenes.title: Post-Capture Planning and Newspaper's Courage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the team at Clarion office working through the night to produce the newspaper, emphasizing courage and decency as their guiding principles.

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Conflict and Betsy's Strong Stance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to ranch conflicts, introducing Steve Daley and Betsy, depicting confrontations, ranch problems, and Betsy asserting her authority.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and Introduction of Steve Daley
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a ranch confrontation and introduces Steve Daley as the new hire, setting up initial character dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Bunk Assignment and Ranch Troubles
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes Steve's bunk assignment, Hank defending hiring Steve, and Betsy discussing ranch problems and cautious approach.

sub_scenes.title: Buckboard Ride and Town Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy and Steve's buckboard ride to town, Betsy's reflections, Hank giving orders, and their arrival in town for dress material.

Major_Arcs.title: Bodyguard Confirmed and Romantic Turn
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Betsy in town, facing confrontation, confirming Steve as her bodyguard, dealing with Hank's insecurity, and culminating in a romantic confession and embrace with Steve.

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Bodyguard Decision
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy facing town gossip and confrontation, leading to Steve physically asserting himself and Betsy confirming his role as bodyguard.

sub_scenes.title: Hank's Plea and Romantic Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Hank's plea to stay employed, Betsy reassuring him, and then transitioning to Betsy setting conditions for Steve's job, leading to a romantic turn.

narrative_arcs.title: Hank's Job Secured and Gratitude Expressed
Clarification and Choice about Gunfighter Role
Betsy's Change of Heart and Plea to Stay

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch War and Romantic Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating conflict with Bridges, Betsy's firm stance, flashbacks revealing past tragedy, leading to a violent confrontation and ultimately a romantic resolution between Betsy and Steve.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation with Bridges
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with Bridges' arrival and confrontation at Betsy's ranch, escalating into threats and gun display.

narrative_arcs.title: Analysis of the Confrontation as a Declaration of War

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Assertion and Steve's Flashback
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes Betsy asserting her authority and right to bear arms, followed by Steve's reflection and a flashback revealing past tragedy.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Assertion of Authority and Gun Ownership
Steve's Reflection, Flashback to Ambush, and Hank's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Departure and Betsy's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Steve's determined departure, Betsy's contemplation, and her decision to pursue him to Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Betsy's Shooting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the arrival at Devil's Pass, escalating confrontation, and Betsy's dramatic shooting.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Romantic Climax at Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the aftermath of Betsy's shooting, her survival, reunion with Steve, and their romantic resolution amidst the crisis.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Survival and Reunion with Steve

Major_Arcs.title: New Ranch Disputes and Carrie's Complex Relationships
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new ranch disputes and focuses on Carrie's complex relationships with Dave and Fred, marked by arguments, shifting opinions, and romantic entanglements.

sub_scenes.title: Argument about Dave and Curley's Actions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with an argument about Dave, followed by observations of Curley's unexpected actions in the corral.

sub_scenes.title: Trouble with Bar Fenin Ranch Buyers
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces trouble arising from the new Bar Fenin ranch buyers encroaching on their north range.

narrative_arcs.title: Trouble with Bar Fenin Ranch Buyers

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts discussions about fence and range issues, leading to Fred Gordon's confrontational arrival and a subsequent gunfight.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussing the Fence and Range Issues
Fred Gordon's Confrontation at the Fence

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie and Dave's Tumultuous Relationship and Carlton Contract
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Carrie and Dave's complex and tumultuous relationship, intertwined with the Carlton contract, marked by apologies, misunderstandings, and betrayals.

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Reconciliation, and Tension with Fred
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie apologizing to Dave, their reconciliation, and a tense interaction with Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Intimate Conversation and Reflection on Fred

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Private Conversation, and Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie confronting Fred, a private conversation with Dave, and culminates in a marriage proposal and romantic resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Misunderstandings and Romantic Resolution

sub_scenes.title: Carlton Contract Deception and Carrie's Determination
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the Carlton contract proposition, Carrie accusing Dave of trickery, and Carrie's determination to fight back against Fred's manipulation.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Inquiry with Dave and Fred

sub_scenes.title: Carlton's Office and Resolution with Father's Help
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie and Fred arriving at Carlton's office, Carrie confronting Fred, and ultimately resolving the situation with her father's help, leading to emotional comfort and Fred's defeat.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Interruption at Carlton's Office
Carlton's Business History and Carrie's Resolution

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie's Independence and Love Confessions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Carrie asserting her independence and Western identity, followed by encounters with Dave, leading to confessions of love and departure plans.

sub_scenes.title: Declaration of Independence and Bar Gossip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie declaring her independence to Fred and then encountering Dave, hearing bar gossip about Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Declaration of Independence and Western Identity

sub_scenes.title: Love Confession and Departure Plans
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie and Dave's emotional conversation, leading to Carrie confessing her love for Fred and announcing her departure plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Anger, Apology, and Question of Love

sub_scenes.title: Father's Wisdom and Dave's Accusation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes Carrie's reflection on her father's wisdom during a ride home and Dave's accusatory confrontation of Carrie.

narrative_arcs.title: Father's Wisdom and Long Ride Home
Accusation of Heartbreak and Eastern Trickery

Major_Arcs.title: Reunion and Romantic Climax with Fred
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Carrie's internal reflection and her eventual reunion with Fred, culminating in a passionate confession of love and romantic resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Father's Advice and Hastened Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie reflecting on her father's wisdom, leading to her hasty action and a reunion set up by Fred's brother.

sub_scenes.title: Revelation, Confession, and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes revelations from Fred's brother, Carrie's emotional reaction, reunion with Fred, and culminates in a mutual declaration of love and romantic climax.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Dave's Words and Embracing Love

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Chris's Chase and Tragic Outcome
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Dirk and Chris's storyline, depicting Dirk's desperate plea, the revelation of his gunshot wound, their escape, relentless pursuit, violent confrontation, and tragic aftermath.

sub_scenes.title: Desperate Plea and Gunshot Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with Dirk's desperate plea at Chris's window and the revelation of his serious gunshot wound.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Mistaken Identity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the older man investigating Dirk's situation and Chris Ransom's arrival at the ranch with mistaken identity and forceful search.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Search and Blood Stained Pinto

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Duty, and Unguarded Dirk
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a confrontation about Dirk's actions, a badge-wearing authority figure asserting his duty, and Dirk's friend intervening to protect him.

sub_scenes.title: Resignation, Reunion, and Confession of Love (Chris & Rance)
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to a man in red shirt (Dirk) contemplating escape, an unexpected reunion with a woman, and then switches to Chris and Rance's romantic confessions.

sub_scenes.title: Duty vs Love and the Chase Begins
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Rance balancing duty and love for Chris, leading to a plan to pursue Dirk and the start of the chase.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase and Violent Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the escape, relentless pursuit, and violent confrontation between Rance and Dirk, resulting in Rance shooting someone.

sub_scenes.title: Moral Dilemma and Difficult Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the aftermath of the shooting, a moral dilemma about the wounded person's fate, and Dirk and Chris's difficult departure.

narrative_arcs.title: The Difficult Departure and Lingering Feelings

sub_scenes.title: Chris's Return and Dirk's Escape to Mexico
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chris's confession of love and decision to return to Rance, contrasted with Dirk's escape to Mexico and his perceived safety.

Major_Arcs.title: Rance and Chris's Reunion and Wedding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the story with Rance's recovery, reunion with Chris, their mutual confessions of love, marriage proposal and wedding, resolving the romantic storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Awakening and Mutual Love Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Rance regaining consciousness, Chris's devoted care, and their mutual confession of love.

narrative_arcs.title: Mutual Feelings and Confession of Love

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Unexpected Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows wedding preparations, Chris's lingering concern about Dirk, and Dirk's dramatic arrival at the wedding.

narrative_arcs.title: Chris's Concern and Rance's Reassurance about Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Resolution and Marshal's Trap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Rance managing Dirk's arrival at the wedding, followed by a shift to the Marshal revealing his plan and Dirk's past, concluding the narrative.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marshal's Appreciation and Wedding Gift
